fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
When visited the visitor must roll 36 d6's
If more than 26 are either a 4, 5 or 6 do nothing
Otherwise you will create a hydra with you and the visitor (multiple people with the same role and same slot)
The hydra will not be known by the town and majority will be unknowingly adjusted to said hydra, as it only has 1 vote alltogether

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Absorb the town in Nothing There's hydra. Abnormalitities do not need to be absorbed.
